newsitem.title: USA: CBOT overnight Project A ag volume 1,222 contracts.
newsitem.headline: CBOT overnight Project A ag volume 1,222 contracts.

text.p: Chicago Board of Trade's Project A overnight agricultural contracts trading volume totaled 1,222 contracts, according to the CBOT.
There were 161 wheat contracts, 513 corn, 517 soybean, 7 soymeal, 10 soyoil, and 14 oats futures contracts traded, along with one wheat call, 13 soybean call and one corn put option contract.

The overnight trend for corn was down 2-3/4 to four cents per bushel, soybeans down 5 to 7-1/4 cents, wheat down four to 4-3/4 cents, soymeal down 90 cents a ton, soyoil steady to down 0.13 cent a lb, and oats down two to 2-3/4 cents per bushel.
